description: Washing the face and hands with soap and water every day helps to prevent eye infections. In some parts of the world, eye infections can lead to trachoma, which can cause blindness.
title: Washing the face and hands with soap and water every day helps to prevent eye infections. In some parts of the world, eye infections can lead to trachoma, which can cause blindness.
content:
Flies carry germs. A dirty face attracts flies, spreading the germs from
person to person. If the eyes become sore or infected, vision may be impaired
or lost. Eyes must be kept clean and healthy.

If the eyes are healthy, the white part is clear, the eyes are moist and
shiny, and vision is sharp. If the eyes are extremely dry or very red and
sore, if there is a discharge or if there is difficulty seeing, the child
should be examined by a trained health worker as soon as possible.
